title: Returnal & Hades are Changing Gaming - The Blessing Show
description:
What is a Roguelike? What is a Roguelite? And what does the success of Hades and Returnal mean for the future of Rogue Games? In this episode of The Blessing Show, Blessing breaks down what's up with Roguelites.
